languages.text: {n}Маршал чуть наклоняет голову.{/n} "Разрыв контракта приведет к тому, что Адептус Арбитес более не будут считать себя обязанными оказывать вам поддержку, в том числе — предоставлением людей в свиту".

{n}The Marshal inclines his head.{/n} "If you were to break this pact, the Adeptus Arbites would no longer consider itself obligated to provide you with support, such as by bolstering your personal retinue with Arbitrators."
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал чуть наклоняет голову.{/n} "Разрыв контракта приведет к тому, что Адептус Арбитес более не будут считать себя обязанными оказывать вам поддержку, в том числе — предоставлением людей в свиту".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Marshal inclines his head.{/n} "If you were to break this pact, the Adeptus Arbites would no longer consider itself obligated to provide you support, such as by bolstering your personal retinue with Arbitrators."

{n}The Marshal inclines his head.{/n} "If you were to break this pact, the Adeptus Arbites would no longer consider itself obligated to provide you with support, such as by bolstering your personal retinue with Arbitrators."

{n}The Marshal inclines his head.{/n} "If you were to break this pact, the Adeptus Arbites would no longer consider itself obligated to provide you with support, such as by bolstering your personal retinue with Arbitrators."

languages.text: {n}Le maréchal incline la tête.{/n} « Si vous enfreignez cet accord, l'Adeptus Arbites sera aussitôt libéré de ses obligations envers vous, notamment en ce qui concerne l'affectation d'arbitrators à votre entourage personnel. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal inclines his head.{/n} "If you were to break this pact, the Adeptus Arbites would no longer consider itself obligated to provide you with support, such as by bolstering your personal retinue with Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maréchal incline la tête.{/n} « Si vous enfreignez cet accord, l'Adeptus Arbites sera aussitôt libéré de ses obligations envers vous, notamment en ce qui concerne l'affectation d'arbitrators à votre entourage personnel. »

languages.text: {n}El Mariscal inclina la cabeza.{/n} «De romper este pacto, el Adeptus Arbites ya no estaría en la obligación de proporcionarle apoyo como, por ejemplo, el refuerzo de su séquito personal con Arbitrator».
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal inclines his head.{/n} "If you were to break this pact, the Adeptus Arbites would no longer consider itself obligated to provide you with support, such as by bolstering your personal retinue with Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Mariscal inclina la cabeza.{/n} «De romper este pacto, el Adeptus Arbites ya no estaría en la obligación de proporcionarle apoyo como, por ejemplo, el refuerzo de su séquito personal con Arbitrator».

languages.text: {n}元帅侧过了头。{/n}“如果你违反了我们的协议，法务部也不再有义务向你提供支援。比如说，我们会将法务官从你的随行人员中撤出。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal inclines his head.{/n} "If you were to break this pact, the Adeptus Arbites would no longer consider itself obligated to provide you with support, such as by bolstering your personal retinue with Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅侧过了头。{/n}“如果你违反了我们的协议，法务部也不再有义务向你提供支援。比如说，我们会将法务官从你的随行人员中撤出。”

languages.text: {n}Der Marschall legt seinen Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Solltet Ihr diesen Pakt aufkündigen, betrachtet es das Adeptus Arbites nicht länger als seine Pflicht, Euch beispielsweise durch die Stärkung Eures persönlichen Gefolges mit Arbitratoren zu unterstützen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal inclines his head.{/n} "If you were to break this pact, the Adeptus Arbites would no longer consider itself obligated to provide you with support, such as by bolstering your personal retinue with Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Marschall legt seinen Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Solltet Ihr diesen Pakt aufkündigen, betrachtet es das Adeptus Arbites nicht länger als seine Pflicht, Euch beispielsweise durch die Stärkung Eures persönlichen Gefolges mit Arbitratoren zu unterstützen."

languages.text: {n}将帥は頭を垂れる。{/n}「もしあなたがこの協定を破るというなら、高等裁定局はこれ以上あなたにアービトレイターであなたの個人的な従者を増強するといったような支援を提供する義務はないものと判断します」
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal inclines his head.{/n} "If you were to break this pact, the Adeptus Arbites would no longer consider itself obligated to provide you with support, such as by bolstering your personal retinue with Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: {n}将帥は頭を垂れる。{/n}「もしあなたがこの協定を破るというなら、高等裁定局はこれ以上あなたにアービトレイターであなたの個人的な従者を増強するといったような支援を提供する義務はないものと判断します」

languages.text: {n}Miralay başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bu anlaşmayı bozacak olursanız Adeptus Arbites, size destek sağlama yükümlülüğünü bir kenara bırakacaktır. Örneğin maiyetinize Yargıcı sunmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal inclines his head.{/n} "If you were to break this pact, the Adeptus Arbites would no longer consider itself obligated to provide you with support, such as by bolstering your personal retinue with Arbitrators."
